channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Security flaws in Freedom Chat app exposed users’ phone numbers and PINs
item.description: The founder of Freedom Chat said the company has reset user PINs and released a new version to app stores.

item.title: Zeekr 007 GT : on a essayé le break électrique chinois de 646 ch qui arrive en Europe et qui veut faire de l’ombre à l’Audi E5
item.description: On a eu la chance d'essayer la nouvelle Zeekr 007 GT. Une voiture électrique chinoise prévue pour l'Europe, qui se recharge en 10 minutes et dotée de 646 ch. Voici notre premier avis.

item.title: This Worm Was Chilling in a Lab for Years. Turns Out It’s a Record-Breaker
item.description: His name is B, and he lives in Virginia.

item.title: Wario’s one and only 3D platformer is now playable on Switch 2
item.description: Nintendo has been slowly drip-feeding us GameCube games since the console joined its Nintendo Classics offering when the Switch 2 launched in June, and we just got another one. Switch Online + Expansion Pack subscribers can now play Wario’s one and only 3D platformer on the service. Wario World launched in 2003 and was developed by Treasure (Gunstar Heroes, Ikaruga). You play as Wario, the flatulent antithesis of Nintendo’s primary mascot, in what is a combat-heavy platformer. Wario’s castle has been overthrown by an evil piece of sentient jewellery called Black Jewel, and it’s up to the garli...

item.title: I tried Photoshop in ChatGPT — it's an awesome free AI superpower
item.description: ChatGPT's new Photoshop, Acrobat, and Express features are excellent, and best of all, they're free

item.title: Pick up our favorite Anker MagSafe power bank while it's on sale for 34 percent off
item.description:
If you're traveling for the holidays, there are few things more useful to take with you than a portable charger. Whether you're using your phone for music and navigation on a long drive or music and logistics before, during and after a flight, you'll want it to stay alive for the entire door-to-door journey. A number of our favorites — like this Anker MagGo 10K bank — are on sale right now for record-low, or close to them, prices.
Even better, the Anker MagGo power bank is currently on sale for $60, down from $90. This 34 percent discount brings the power bank to only $5 more than its all-ti...

item.title: Google DeepMind partners with the UK government for 'science breakthroughs, cleaner energy'
item.description: Google continues to invest in the UK, this time with a new DeepMind research facility.

item.title: The Galaxy Z TriFold has a neat PC trick that could justify its price tag – and I hope it comes to the iPhone Fold
item.description: The Galaxy Z TriFold will support the Second Screen feature in the same way that Samsung's Android tablets do.

item.title: Spotify just launched its most powerful playlist creator yet – here are 3 things you should know about Prompted Playlists
item.description: Spotify just revealed a new feature that lets you create playlists that refresh frequently, and I'm beyond excited.

item.title: Spotify vous donne la main sur son algorithme : ce que ça change
item.description: Spotify dévoile une fonction destinée à ses utilisateurs Premium leur permettant d'influencer l'algorithme pour créer des playlists à leur goût.

item.title: La nouvelle enceinte connectée Amazon qui se mue en barre de son Dolby Atmos est déjà en promotion
item.description: L’Amazon Echo Studio millésime 2025 est une enceinte connectée haut de gamme, certifiée Dolby Atmos dans un format compact. Parfaite au cœur d’un écosystème Alexa, elle peut même jouer les mini home cinéma. Sortie il y a moins de deux mois, elle s’affiche déjà en promo : de 239,99 euros à 214,99 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Google's Gemini AI comes to Chrome on iPhone and iPad
item.description: After rolling it out on desktop and Android earlier in 2025, Google is finally bringing its built-in Gemini AI experience to iPhone and iPad. It offers new features like summarizing pages and helping you test your knowledge about a subject you're learning. As with any AI tool, though, it shouldn't be trusted for anything important given the possibility of hallucinations and other errors. When it arrives on your iOS device, tapping the spark icon at the left of the address bar (in place of the Google Lens camera) brings up a "Pages tool" that offers Lens and the new feature, "Ask Gemini." You ...

item.title: 6 Best Costco TVs That We’ve Tried and Recommend (2025)
item.description: Costco fans rejoice. We’ve found great deals on televisions exclusively for members.

item.title: Operation Bluebird Wants to Bring ‘Twitter’ Back to Life
item.description: Elon Musk “bid adieu to the Twitter brand” in 2023 in favor of X. A startup wants to resurrect it.

item.title: The Game Awards are losing their luster
item.description: It's Game Awards season, y'all. That special time of the year when we gather together to celebrate video games and the people who make them… by watching expensive commercials briefly punctuated by the odd awards speech or musical performance. For better or worse, The Game Awards is the biggest night on the video game event […]

item.title: Interest in Spoor’s bird monitoring AI software is soaring
item.description: Spoor's computer vision software can help wind farms, and other industries, track bird populations and migration patterns.

item.title: Eclipse Energy’s microbes can turn idle oil wells into hydrogen factories
item.description: The biotech startup is betting that owners of abandoned oil wells will use the tech to squeeze energy out of their wells.

item.title: Opera wants you to pay $20 a month to use its AI-powered browser Neon
item.description: Following a couple of months' testing, Opera has finally made its AI-powered browser, Neon, available to the public — though you'll have to shell out for a $19.90-per-month subscription to use it.

item.title: Opera Neon is now available, and I think it's an AI subscription worth paying for
item.description: Opera Neon is an AI web browser that lets you make your own version of the internet, and I'm shocked by how much I enjoyed using it.

item.title: The powerful Dell 16 Plus laptop is back to its lowest ever price
item.description: The all-new Dell 16 drops back to its record-low price on the official Dell website.

item.title: Samsung divulgâche la principale nouveauté de ses Galaxy S26
item.description: Samsung semble avoir vendu la mèche avant l’heure. Alors que la présentation officielle du Galaxy S26 Ultra n’est attendue qu’en février 2026, la fiche d’un nouveau chargeur 60 W publiée sur le site du constructeur laisse peu de place au doute : le futur fleuron sud-coréen devrait enfin profiter d’une vitesse de charge en nette hausse, après plusieurs générations limitées à 45 W....

item.title: Google is rolling out a Pixel Camera 10.2 update that seems to be getting users even more confused
item.description: What you see after the Pixel Camera 10.2 update will depend on the model of Pixel you've got.

item.title: Meet B&O’s elite new Phantom and Mirage speakers — if you need to know the price, you can't afford them
item.description: It’s POA only for Bang & Olufsen’s huge multi-driver speakers in ‘Phantom’ or ‘Mirage’

item.title: South Park season 28 episode 5 ending gives us the Christmas miracle we've been waiting for (almost)
item.description: South Park season 28 is finally over, and episode 5 gave us the moment we've all been waiting for... even in real-life.

item.title: From Hack to Hijack: Thieves Hit the Vape Truck, Steal $1 Million Worth of E-Cigs
item.description: Up in smoke.

item.title: Best Merino Wool Clothing (2025): Base Layers, Hoodies, Jackets & More
item.description: Merino is one of the best fabrics you can wear. We explain the different blends, what “gsm” means, and how to care for your clothes.

item.title: Pluie de remise sur les aspirateurs Dreame : voici 4 offres pour un intérieur impeccable avant Noël [Sponso]
item.description: Et si Noël était aussi l’occasion de faire le plein de bonnes affaires ? Jusqu’au 24 décembre, le spécialiste des aspirateurs intelligents Dreame affiche jusqu’à 220 euros de remise sur ses meilleures références de l’année.

item.title: Save up to 40% with Autodesk’s Media & Entertainment Collection
item.description: Save up to 40% with Autodesk’s Media & Entertainment Collection

item.title: Ce que vous voyez là… c’est la Lune : cette photo incroyable a remporté un prix international de photo !
item.description: Comme chaque année, le Royal Museums Greenwish, une association de musées en Angleterre, récompense les meilleures photographes du ciel. Une image complètement déformée de la Lune a suscité l'étonnement.

item.title: Michelle Pfeiffer and Oh. What. Fun. cast play Does It Ring Christmas?
item.description: We get into what makes a Christmas movie with 'Oh. What. Fun.'s Michelle Pfeiffer, Denis Leary, Chloë Grace Moretz, Felicity Jones, and Dominic Sessa.

item.title: Score a free Apple iPhone 17 right now with T-Mobile — how to qualify for this wild offer
item.description: T-Mobile is giving away a free Apple iPhone 17 ($830 off). No trade is required with a new line and port on Experience Beyond​.

item.title: Kamrui Mini PCs Join Amazon’s Holiday Clearance at Record Low, Plus an Extra Discount Code to Rival the Mac Mini
item.description: Two of KAMRUI's very best mini PCs are worth a (very small) spot on your desk, especially at these new prices.

item.title: This new Android phone is designed for everyone who misses the Xperia Play and N-Gage
item.description: The Ayaneo Pocket Play is coming to Kickstarter soon, and it promises to serve as a true handheld console, while also being a full Android phone.

item.title: Stephen Colbert ridicules Trumps advice that Americans should give up pencils to save money
item.description: Stephen Colbert unpacked Donald Trump's statement that Americans should "give up pencils" to save money in a turbulent economy.

item.title: Microsoft stops breaking Windows 11 – instead it just made Phone Link even better with Android apps
item.description: Like to run Android apps on Windows 11 using Phone Link? A new feature is coming that's sure to please.

item.title: Fini les réglages hasardeux sur Steam Deck : l’outil indispensable pour optimiser vos jeux en 2 clics
item.description: L'application DeckSettings permet de trouver rapidement les bons réglages pour profiter de son Steam Deck dans les meilleures conditions.

item.title: Convicted Crypto Wallet Developer Warns Miners Will Be Next in Bitcoin Crackdown
item.description: Many in the crypto world have been pleased with Trump's friendly treatment. Others still think the government is out to get them.

item.title: Want the same milk and eggs? Instacart might charge you more than your neighbor
item.description: Volunteers in four cities found a 75% rate of price discrepancies on identical products, raising questions about Instacart’s AI-powered pricing strategy. Instacart’s artificial intelligence-enabled pricing may be increasing the cost of your groceries by as much as $1,200 a year, according to a new study published on Monday.

item.title: Des apps bannies par les États-Unis ont prospéré dans les boutiques d’Apple et Google
item.description: Des dizaines d’applications directement liées à des organisations sanctionnées par les autorités américaines sont distribuées par l’App Store et le Play Store, en contradiction totale avec la législation US. Apple et Google ont commencé le ménage.

item.title: Independent auditors inspect NordVPN's security once again – here's what they found
item.description: Nineteen senior testers from German cybersecurity firm Cure53 spent months scrutinizing NordVPN's apps, servers, and source code. Here’s what they discovered.

item.title: Hugh Jackman Says ‘It Doesn’t Feel Like the End’ for Wolverine
item.description: He was last seen in 'Deadpool & Wolverine,' but could Jackman return in 'Avengers: Doomsday' or 'Secret Wars'?

item.title: Laptops Have Never Been Cheaper. That Trend Might Reverse in 2026
item.description: Despite all the worries about the economy, laptop prices have never been lower. But in 2026, all of that could change.

item.title: Seagate's limited edition Astro Bot PS5 hard drive releases today, and it's the perfect PlayStation gift this holiday – here's why and where to buy it
item.description: The new Astro Bot PS5 external hard drive from Sony and Seagate launches today – here's why it's a great gift this holiday season.

item.title: Supergirl trailer launch live: all of the build-up, news, and rumors before the DCU movie's teaser is released
item.description: The first trailer for Supergirl will be released later today – and TechRadar will be covering it live.

item.title: The Apple Watch just got its coolest upgrade in years – you can now talk to your DJI drone from your wrist
item.description: DJI looks set to push out a couple more products before a US ban is expected to come into effect on 23 December.

item.title: Ben & Jerrys is launching Ice Cream Bars — how to get free Cookie Dough bars this month
item.description: Ben & Jerry's is launching Ice Cream Bars. More than 150 Scoop Shops are handing out free Cookie Dough bars on Dec. 17.

item.title: I thought every gaming headset was embarrassing to wear until I saw this new model from Final
item.description: The Final VR3000 EX is a new gaming headset with a refreshingly classy design.
